Text.Page: (Even unpowered, the dark pressure of the dementalith is suffocating.)

The dark energy arising from the Dementalith is suffocating. Even though Thulsa is gone, the power of the Dementalith still remains as strong as ever. <TEXTBUTTON>Investigate more closely.</TEXTBUTTON><EVENTPAGEBUTTON>The power of the Dementalith is becoming stronger.</EVENTPAGEBUTTON>
